attributes.action: stop claiming that there is consensus on climate change.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The government, green lobby groups, and most of the media, claim that there is consensus amongst scientists that global warming is a proven scientific fact and that mankind is responsible. This is absolutely untrue. There are a huge number of scientists that dispute the claim, and a plethora of scientific evidence against it. The government is grossly dishonest to claim otherwise.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "stop claiming that there is consensus on climate change."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here:

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page14085.asp

Prime Minister's Office
